text: Nambi uli (pandema jayayichilile ilagasyo) nganiyakamuchisya ayila yawalitendele yangawaga Allah kuwa milungu jakuliwandichilisya Kukwakwe? Nambo yasokonechele wanganyao, soni walakweo (wakuitenda isanamu kuwa milungu jakwawandichisya kwa Allah) ni unami wao, ni (yaukoleko) yaawele wanganyao ali nkutunga
